item.title: Moments: Breakfast With Champions
item.description:
Hayden: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cfksYTFzY5M

Point is made was cricket was a big threatre for him, and live broadcasted threatre. He gave his performance and fine. I didn’t saw cricket or any game on those lines before. He made it feel like art form.

Brett Lee: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t

Pain brett lee went through while bowling:

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t=14m0s
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0Wc6TaokI&t=15m26s

Michael Holding: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbKkJO1OEc4

Really nice to hear his opinion and found someone who synchronizes with my thought process.
